titleStmt.title: The knavish merchant (now turn'd warehouseman) characterized or A severe scourge, for an unjust, cruel, and unconsionable adversary / By Philadelphus Verax a cordial friend to his honest (though injuriously oppressed) aquaintance Thomas Crocker merchant.
titleStmt.author: Verax, Philadelphus.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the second month of the next year that tyrants ceas't do domineer. [1661]

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
